name: Ring Drive Combat
description: You are the last chance to save humanity from the genocidal invasion of The Machines. The rotating ring above the city is where you hold your last stand. Survive all 10 waves of enemies or suffer your explosive fate. You must maneuver your hovercraft away from imminent dangers, like lava and incoming projectiles, all while using your burst rifle to shoot and destroy The Machines. Humanity is counting on you. Will you step up to the task?
